name: Godstones
description:
Godstones is a part toy / part interactive  narrative game in which you determine the fate of a tribeswoman and her unborn child by asking the gods for help.

Cast the stones and divine the will of the gods. 

Created in 48 hours for the idiom gamejam: https://itch.io/jam/idiomgamejam

Music

Dama-May by Kevin MacLeod (http://www.incompetech.com)
